name: Bullet Knight
description:
You are a fallen knight.
Fallen in the deepest cave of the world.

All you have is your shield and your bullets. Use the bullets to climb as higher as you can.
Monsters reward you with bullets.

Be careful, don't run out of bullets.

How to play:

Move: W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys

Shoot: Space

Restart: R

Assets Used:

Music: https://gooseninja.itch.io/happy-loops

Sound Effects: https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack

Graphics: https://0x72.itch.io/microfantasy
